Piskel clone

This is a free online editor for animated sprites & pixel art

Go to create an animated sprite

Example sprites

  • Live preview

    Check a preview of your animation in real time as you draw.

  • Google Sign in

    No need to remember yet another password, just use your Google account to sign in.

  • Export to GIF

    Export your animated sprite to file system in .gif format

  • Save your session

    You can save your current session after sign in with google login

  • Adjustable FPS

    Customize fps parameter of final animation

  • A lot of diffrent tools

    The editor has 10 diffrent tools for your creative

Contacts

App developed by Anastasia Zabela for educational purposes during Roling Scopes School course

CV

Original idea by piskelapp.com
